com.bomberman.game.Model

Class ExplosionBounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bomberman.game.Model.ExplosionBounds

  • public class ExplosionBounds
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by huddy on 6/19/16. Class created to store all necessary informations about bombs explosion range, its position, range and elements it should delete after explosion
